name: Delay (Stereo)
description: This algorithm is a simple stereo in/stereo out delay effect. The delay time can be set manually, via a clock pulse, or via MIDI clock. It can also be modulated via its ‘V/oct input’, which halves the delay time for every 1V rise in CV (conversely, doubles it for every 1V fall in CV). The ‘Fractional’ parameter allows for delay times that are not integer multiples of the sample rate, slightly increasing CPU load but improving sound quality when modulated. Turning off fractional delays yields a clean digital delay with no coloration.

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description: The gain applied to the delay/wet signal.

parameters.name: Initial pan
parameters.description: If the mode is 'Ping-pong', sets the pan position of the first delay.

parameters.name: Delay multiplier
parameters.description: Sets a multiplier to apply to the delay time. Affects both the 'Time' parameter and the delay time set by the clock.

parameters.name: Time change
parameters.description: Sets how changes of delay time will be handled. The options are 'Slew' (the delay time is smoothly interpolated) and 'Crossfade' (rapidly crossfades from one setting to the other).

parameters.name: Fractional
parameters.description: Enables fractional delay times. Slightly increases CPU load but improves sound quality when modulated.

parameters.name: Block DC
parameters.description: Enables a DC blocker at the delay input. Recommended for audio use; disable when processing CVs.

parameters.name: Clock source
parameters.description: Chooses the clock source: 'None', 'Clock input', or 'MIDI clock'.

parameters.name: MIDI divisor
parameters.description: The MIDI divisor, if the clock source is 'MIDI clock'.

parameters.name: MIDI numerator
parameters.description: The MIDI numerator, if the clock source is 'MIDI clock'.

input_ports.name: Clock Input (if selected)
input_ports.description: Input bus for clock synchronization when 'Clock source' is set to 'Clock input'.

input_ports.name: V/oct Input
input_ports.description: CV input for 1V/octave modulation of delay time.

input_ports.name: Clock input
input_ports.description: The input bus to use for the clock, if the source is 'Clock input'.

input_ports.name: V/oct input
input_ports.description: The input bus to use for 1V/octave modulation of the delay time.
